transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir, main India Mart se baat kar raha hu sir, [inaudible] sir.
Customer: Ji Anand.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir, ji badhiya hu.
Executive: Ji ji, hello, aapko na call aayi thi customer care se na kisi ji hamare yaha se.
Meri aawaz clear hai na aapko?
Customer: Ji meri, haan aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai clear aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji, sir aapko jo na call aayi thi.
Customer: Mujhe call aayi thi.
Mene Shiv Engineering Ahmedabad se machine purchase kiya tha through on IndiaMART.
Executive: Ek second sir.
Line par rahiye.
Ji sir.
Customer: Mene ek IndiaMART ke through machine purchase kiya tha steel leveling machine Ahmedabad se Shiv Engineering se.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Sir wo pichle kai dino se mera call receive nahi kar rahe hai, sale service ko leke.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Machine ke andar koi parts ke jalne ki boo aa rahi hai aur machine chal nahi raha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sir actually kya hai ki dekho IndiaMART jo hai na actually hum log aapko lead provide karte hai jisse aap business convert karte hai, hai na sir?
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: To yaha pe kya hota hai ki hamara jo IndiaMART ka kaam hai wo basically aapko lead provide karana hai.
To aap internally unse coordinate kijiye sir, mai bhi unse koi aur other number unhone nahi provide karaya hai?
Customer: Nahi sir, unhone koi other number provide nahi karaya hai aur mene IndiaMART pe call isiliye kiya tha ki har dealer ka aapke paas mein do number hote hai, ek primary number, ek alternative number.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To aap us unka jo ek number matlab jo diya hua hai wo to lag nahi raha hai, alternative number koi unka ho to wo mujhe aap provide karega ki taaki mein aage unse conversation karke is samasya ka resolve karu.
Sir aaj mene itna bada
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Invest karne ke baad mein us cheez ka mein upyog nahi le pa raha hu.
Executive: Ah, kaun si company hai sir ek baar naam bataye company ka?
Customer: Shiv Engineering Ahmedabad.
Executive: Accha, Mayur, Gajera.
Customer: Haan Mayur Gajera, ye naam hai?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Thik hai sir, mein isko jo hai na ek baar jo number aapko already ah, diya hoga, ah, baki jo hai so actually kya hota hai sir ki hamare paas bhi na wahi number available hota hai jo hum aapko provide karte hai.
Customer: Nahi sir do number rehte hai aapke paas mein, actually ah, mein khud bhi ek paid member hu aapke yaha pe, mere khud ke bhi do number diye hue hai, ek primary number, ek alternative number.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Aur kis prakar se paanch number update hote hai aapke system mein jiske upar ek jab bhi koi lead call karti hai to paanch alag alag numbero pe divert hota hai wo jisme se jo bhi pehle receive kar le then wo call.
Executive: Sir ye kitne dino pehle aapne
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Ye service.
Kitne dino pehle?
Customer: Sir dekho lagbhag char paanch mahine ho chuke hai us cheez ko liye to.
Executive: Accha accha char paanch mahine ho gaye.
Okay, sir IndiaMART se aapke profile se related koi issue hai sir?
Customer: Nahi meri profile se related koi issue nahi hai, mujhe to us party ka alternative number chahiye ki taaki mein unse consult kar saku ki isme jo samasya hai usko resolve karaiye ya to fir jo data hai mujhe data share kijiye to mein bazaar se us particular parts ko purchase karke usme jo data hai wo data fit kar sakta hu aur mein mera jo bhi aage kaam hai us kaam ko continue karu.
Executive: Ah, thik hai sir, mein ek baar jo hai na check karta hu aapke aur fir mein aapko [inaudible] electronic component hai software based hai, mein agar bazaar se product kharid ke bhi le aaunga to usme jab tak wo software install nahi hoga aage kaam nahi hoga.
Executive: Okay, accha sir mein abhi aap se puchna chah raha tha ki aapka jo concern hai wo tag ho chuka hai aapke profile pe, to actually IndiaMART se aapke profile se related to koi issue nahi hai na aapko?
Customer: Nahi meri profile se related mujhe koi issue nahi hai. tag hua hai ye profile, to baki aap ye number aapko visual ho raha hoga, aapko kabhi bhi future mein problem ho na kisi bhi type ka aap is number pe pehle call kar lijiye sir, fir iske baad aapke paas aur bhi customer care ka number hota hi hai.
Baki ye jo concern hai mein close kar du sir kyuki ye bhi tag hua hai ye aapke profile se related tag hua hai sir.
Customer: Sir concern abhi aap close mat kijiye jab tak mujhe uska alternative number nahi milta.
Executive: Nahi sir wo to sir ye to aapki profile se related hai na sir, aap aapne jo call kiya hai hum aapke profile se related baat kar rahe hai, hai na sir? Kis se related aapka tag hua hai to isme aapko koi issue nahi hai sir, ye to concern isme koi issue nahi hai na aapko?
Customer: Nahi us cheez pe mere ko meri profile ko leke koi issue nahi tha, mujhe to sir.
Executive: Haan mein ek baar check kar leta hu.
Mein aap se yahi keh raha hu ki agar profile se related koi issue hai to sir aap bata sakte hai mein usme ek baar dobara check kar leta hu aapke liye.
Customer: Aap check karke mujhe bataye mein then uska resolve karwa dunga, band karwa dunga.
Executive: Mein ek baar call.
Ah, waise mein ek baar aapko jo hai na abhi connect karta hu sir ek baar baad mein.
Thik hai, thik hai, okay.
Customer: Thik hai ye number.
summary:
Concerns:

- Machine purchased through IndiaMART not working.

- Seller not receiving calls regarding service.

- Wants alternative contact number for seller.



Resolution:

- Executive stated IndiaMART provides leads only.

- Advised customer to coordinate internally with seller.

- Executive offered to check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- machine, service, alternative number, profile
